00050 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00051     
00052     // Allow command line options
00053     int optind = Ps::processOpts(argc, argv);
00054 
00055     char hostname[STR_BUF_LEN];
00056     gethostname(hostname, STR_BUF_LEN);
00057     cout<<"Running on '"<<hostname<<"'\n";
00058 
00059     // Dump options to standard output
00060     Ps::print(cout);
00061     
00062     if (optind < argc) Ps::pPROBLEM_FILE = strdup(argv[optind]);
00063     if (strlen(Ps::pPROBLEM_FILE) == 0) throw std::runtime_error("Need a .POMDP file either in --PROBLEM_FILE or end/beginning of command line");
00064 
00065     cout<<"Running problem '"<<Ps::pPROBLEM_FILE<<"'\n";
00066     ifstream file (Ps::pPROBLEM_FILE);
00067     if (!file.is_open()) throw std::runtime_error("Problem opening file");
00068 
00069     // Create Cassandra with file from command line.
00070     Cassandra* pomdp = readCassandra (file);
00071         
00072     pomdp->print();
00073     
00074         srandom (time(NULL));
00075         srand (time(NULL));
00076         
00077     Controller* controller;
00078 
00079     // Modes govern the structure of controllers
00080     // There should be a mode for:
00081     // Table (default)
00082     // Finite (Olivier's finite history)
00083     // HMM
00084     // PSR
00085     // Belief
00086     if (strcmp(Ps::pMODE, "PSR")==0) {
00087         cout<<"Setting up PSR controller\n";
00088         
00089         Vector nnDims(Ps::pHIDDEN?MLP_LAYERS:LINEAR_LAYERS);
00090         Vector squash(Ps::pHIDDEN?MLP_LAYERS:LINEAR_LAYERS); squash.clear();
00091         
00092         if (Ps::pHIDDEN > 0) {
00093             if (Ps::pMAX_RAND_PARAM == 0.0) throw std::runtime_error("MAX_RAND_PARAMS=0");
00094             nnDims[0] = Ps::pMAX_CORE_TESTS;
00095             nnDims[1] = Ps::pHIDDEN;
00096             nnDims[2] = pomdp->getNumActions();
00097             squash[1] = 1.0;
00098         }
00099         else {
00100             nnDims[0] = Ps::pMAX_CORE_TESTS;
00101             nnDims[1] = pomdp->getNumActions();
00102         }
00103         
00104         controller=new RegularizeTransform(new PSRTransform(new NACTransform(new BasicController(new NeuralNetBatch(nnDims, 
00105                                                                                                                     squash
00106                                                                                                                     )
00107                                                                                                  ), Ps::pTD_DISCOUNT
00108                                                                              ), 
00109                                                             
00110                                                             Ps::pMAX_HISTORY, 
00111                                                             pomdp->getNumObs(),
00112                                                             pomdp->getNumActions(), 
00113                                                             Ps::pPSR_STEP_SIZE, 
00114                                                             Ps::pPASSES_BEFORE_ADDCORES, 
00115                                                             Ps::pMIN_KAPPA_FOR_CORE),
00116                                            Ps::pPENALTY);
00117     }
00118     else if (strcmp(Ps::pMODE, "MEM")==0) {
00119         cout<<"Setting up Finite (observation window) controller\n";
00120         
00121         controller= 
00122             new RegularizeTransform(new CatObsActionTransform(new ObsWindowTransform(new BasicController(new MultidimensionalLookupTable(

00124                                                                                                                                          pomdp->getNumObs() : pomdp->getNumActions(),

00167     }
00168     // Test standard single agent case

00170         pomdp->setCheat (true);
00171         controller= new RegularizeTransform(new BasicController(new LookupTable(pomdp->getNumObs(), pomdp->getNumActions())),
00172                                             Ps::pPENALTY
00173                                             );

00221         cout << "blind" << endl;

00224

00226     }
00227     // Test standard single agent case
00228     else controller= new RegularizeTransform(new BasicController(new LookupTable(pomdp->getNumObs(), pomdp->getNumActions())), 
00229                                              Ps::pPENALTY);
00230         
00231 
00232     
00233     OLPomdp learner(controller, pomdp, pomdp->getDiscount(), Ps::pSTEP_SIZE);
00234

00236     learner.saveBest(Ps::pPARAM_FILE);

00238 
00239     time_t startTime = time(NULL);
00240         
00241     controller->randomizeParams(Ps::pMAX_RAND_PARAM); 
00242     learner.learn(Ps::pSTEPS_PER_EPOCH, Ps::pMAX_TIME, Ps::pMAX_STEPS);
